title: New York State Income Tax Calculator

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: For taxable income T and bracket ranges [b_i^L, b_i^U) with marginal rates r_i: 1) New York taxable income: $$ T = \max\{0, I - D\} $$ 2) Progressive NYS tax: $$ \mathrm{Tax}_{\mathrm{NYS}}(T) = \sum_i r_i \cdot \max\left(0, \min\left(T, b_i^U\right) - b_i^L\right) $$ 3) NYC resident tax (if applicable): $$ \mathrm{Tax}_{\mathrm{NYC}}(T) = \sum_j r_j^{\mathrm{NYC}} \cdot \max\left(0, \min\left(T, u_j^U\right) - u_j^L\right) $$ 4) Yonkers resident surcharge: $$ \mathrm{Tax}_{\mathrm{YON,res}} = \alpha \cdot \mathrm{Tax}_{\mathrm{NYS}}, \quad \alpha = 0.1675 $$ 5) Yonkers nonresident earnings tax: $$ \mathrm{Tax}_{\mathrm{YON,nonres}} = \beta \cdot W_{\mathrm{YON}}, \quad \beta = 0.005 $$ 6) Total: $$ \mathrm{Tax}_{\mathrm{Total}} = \mathrm{Tax}_{\mathrm{NYS}} + \mathrm{Tax}_{\mathrm{NYC}} + \mathrm{Tax}_{\mathrm{YON}} $$ Effective rate: $$ \mathrm{Eff} = \frac{\mathrm{Tax}_{\mathrm{Total}}}{I} $$ Marginal rate (combined, if NYC applies): $$ r_{\mathrm{marg}} = r_k^{\mathrm{NYS}} + r_m^{\mathrm{NYC}} $$
